member.name: T:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions
member.summary: Supplies a set of common conditions that can be waited when using .

example.code: IWait wait = new WebDriverWait(driver, TimeSpan.FromSeconds(3)) IWebElement element = wait.Until(ExpectedConditions.ElementExists(By.Id("element_id")));

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions.PresenceOfAllElementsLocatedBy(OpenQA.Selenium.By)
member.summary: An expectation for checking that all elements present on the web page that match the locator.
member.param: The locator used to find the element.
member.returns: The list of once it is located.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions.ElementExists(OpenQA.Selenium.By)
member.summary: An expectation for checking that an element is present on the DOM of a page. This does not necessarily mean that the element is visible.
member.param: The locator used to find the element.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions.AlertIsPresent
member.summary: An expectation for checking if alert is present on this session.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions.EnabilityOfAllElementsLocatedBy(OpenQA.Selenium.By)
member.summary: An expectation for checking that all elements present on the web page that match the locator are visible and enabled. Visibility means that the elements are not only displayed but also have a height and width that is greater than 0.
member.param: The locator used to find the element.
member.returns: The list of once it is located and visible.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions.FrameToBeAvailableAndSwitchToIt(OpenQA.Selenium.By)
member.summary: An expectation for checking whether the given frame is available to switch to. If the frame is available it switches the given driver to the specified frame.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions.ElementIsSelected(OpenQA.Selenium.By)
member.summary: An expectation for checking that an element is present on the DOM of a page, visible and selected. Visibility means that the element is not only displayed but also has a height and width that is greater than 0.
member.param: The locator used to find the element.
member.returns: The once it is located and visible.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions.SelectedOfAllElementsLocatedBy(OpenQA.Selenium.By)
member.summary: An expectation for checking that all elements are present on the DOM of a page, visible and selected. Visibility means that the element is not only displayed but also has a height and width that is greater than 0.
member.param: The locator used to find the element.
member.returns: The once it is located and visible.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions.ElementIsVisible(OpenQA.Selenium.By)
member.summary: An expectation for checking that an element is present on the DOM of a page and visible. Visibility means that the element is not only displayed but also has a height and width that is greater than 0.
member.param: The locator used to find the element.
member.returns: The once it is located and visible.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions.VisibilityOfAllElementsLocatedBy(OpenQA.Selenium.By)
member.summary: An expectation for checking that all elements present on the web page that match the locator are visible. Visibility means that the elements are not only displayed but also have a height and width that is greater than 0.
member.param: The locator used to find the element.
member.returns: The list of once it is located and visible.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions.InvisibilityOfElementLocated(OpenQA.Selenium.By)
member.summary: An expectation for checking that an element is either invisible or not present on the DOM.
member.param: The locator used to find the element.
member.returns: if the element is not displayed; otherwise, .

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions.ElementToBeClickable(OpenQA.Selenium.By)
member.summary: An expectation for checking if an element is visible and enabled such that you can click it.
member.param: The locator used to find the element.
member.returns: The once it is located and click-able (visible and enabled).

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions.UrlMatches(System.String)
member.summary: An expectation for the URL of the current page to be a specific URL.
member.param: The regular expression that the URL should match.
member.returns: if the URL matches the specified regular expression; otherwise, .

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions.InvisibilityOfAllElementsLocatedBy(OpenQA.Selenium.By)
member.summary: An expectation for checking that all elements are either invisible or not present on the DOM.
member.param: The locator used to find the elements.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions.AttributeMatches(OpenQA.Selenium.By,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: An expectation for the given element's attribute to match a pattern.
member.param: The locator used to find the element.
The attribute name to assert against the pattern.
The regular expression that the attribute should match.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions.TextMatches(OpenQA.Selenium.By,System.String)
member.summary: An expectation for the given element's text to match a pattern.
member.param: The locator used to find the element.
The regular expression that the attribute should match.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExpectedConditions.PageHasBeenLoaded
member.summary: An expectation for the current page status to be 'completed'.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExtensionsUtilities.WebDriverWait(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Gets an instance of with default ignore list of and
member.param: The WebDriver instance used to wait.
The timeout value indicating how long to wait for the condition.
member.returns: implementation which provides the ability to wait for an arbitrary condition during test execution.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Common.ExtensionsUtilities.WebDriverWait(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.TimeSpan,System.Type[])
member.summary: Gets an instance of with default ignore list of and
member.param: The WebDriver instance used to wait.
The timeout value indicating how long to wait for the condition.
The types of exceptions to ignore.
member.returns: implementation which provides the ability to wait for an arbitrary condition during test execution.

member.name: T:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebDriverExtensions
member.summary: A collection of extensions.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebDriverExtensions.ClickListener(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,OpenQA.Selenium.By)
member.summary: An extension method that listens to elements using the provided mechanism. When found, the listener will on all elements.
member.param: The mechanism by which to find elements within a document.
member.remarks: The listener will stop when the driver is disposed or after 10min.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebDriverExtensions.ClickListener(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,OpenQA.Selenium.By,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: An extension method that listens to elements using the provided mechanism. When found, the listener will on all elements.
member.param: The mechanism by which to find elements within a document.
The interval between search ticks. Using a low interval time can reduce performance.
member.remarks: The listener will stop when the driver is disposed or after 10min.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebDriverExtensions.ClickListener(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,OpenQA.Selenium.By,System.TimeSpan,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: An extension method that listens to elements using the provided mechanism. When found, the listener will on all elements.
member.param: The mechanism by which to find elements within a document.
The interval between search ticks. Using a low interval time can reduce performance.
member.remarks: The listener will stop when the driver is disposed or when timeout reached.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebDriverExtensions.CloseAllChildWindows(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver)

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebDriverExtensions.GetDisplayedElement(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,OpenQA.Selenium.By)

member.returns: The first visible matching on the current context.
member.remarks: If not provided, the default timeout is 10 seconds.
member.exception: Thrown when element was not found or not displayed.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebDriverExtensions.NavigateToUrl(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String)
member.summary: Calling the method will load a new web page in the current browser window. This is done using an HTTP GET operation, and the method will block until the load is complete.
member.param: The URL to load. It is best to use a fully qualified URL.

member.summary: Calling the method will load a new web page in the current browser window. This is done using an HTTP GET operation, and the method will block until the load is complete.
member.param: The URL to load. It is best to use a fully qualified URL.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebDriverExtensions.PersistentClick(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,OpenQA.Selenium.By)
member.summary: Persistently attempts to find and click on the given element, until successful or until no exceptions has been thrown.
member.remarks: If not provided, the default timeout is 10 seconds.

The horizontal offset to which to move the mouse.
The vertical offset to which to move the mouse.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebElementExtensions.DelayedSendKeys(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.String)
member.summary: Sends keys to a given Text-Container object with delay between keys. Used for slow typing in order to trigger JS events.
member.remarks: If not provided, the default delay is 100 milliseconds.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebElementExtensions.DelayedSendKeys(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends keys to a given Text-Container object with delay between keys. Used for slow typing in order to trigger JS events.
member.param: If set to will clear the text before sending new text.
member.remarks: If not provided, the default delay is 100 milliseconds.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebElementExtensions.DelayedSendKeys(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sends keys to a given Text-Container object with delay between keys. Used for slow typing in order to trigger JS events.
member.param: The delay time between each key.
member.remarks: If not provided, the default delay is 100 milliseconds.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebElementExtensions.DelayedSendKeys(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends keys to a given Text-Container object with delay between keys. Used for slow typing in order to trigger JS events.
member.param: The delay time between each key.
If set to will clear the text before sending new text.
member.remarks: If not provided, the default delay is 100 milliseconds.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebElementExtensions.JavaScriptClear(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement)
member.summary: Attempts to clear the given data from the text container. This method will not throw an exception.
member.remarks: Works only on Web/Mobile Web platforms.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebElementExtensions.JavaScriptClick(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement)
member.summary: Attempts to click on the given element. Use when element cannot be clicked otherwise. This method will not throw an exception.
member.remarks: Works only on Web/Mobile Web platforms.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebElementExtensions.JavaScriptFocus(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement)
member.summary: The method is used to give focus to an element (if it can be focused). This method will not throw an exception.
member.remarks: Works only on Web/Mobile Web platforms.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebElementExtensions.JavaScriptBlur(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement)
member.summary: The method is used to remove focus from an element. This method will not throw an exception.
member.remarks: Works only on Web/Mobile Web platforms.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebElementExtensions.JavaScriptScrollTop(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.Int32)
member.summary: The property sets the number of pixels an element's content is scrolled vertically.
member.param: The number of pixels an element's content is scrolled vertically.
member.remarks: Works only on Web/Mobile Web platforms.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebElementExtensions.JavaScriptScrollLeft(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.Int32)
member.summary: The property sets the number of pixels an element's content is scrolled horizontally.
member.param: The number of pixels an element's content is scrolled horizontally.
member.remarks: Works only on Web/Mobile Web platforms.

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebElementExtensions.UploadFile(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.String)
member.summary: Allows to set input of file type element with file to upload (bypass all native windows).

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebElementExtensions.SendPostCommand(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Sends POST command directly to this instance.
member.param: Command route starting with "/" (use the complete route which comes after session id).

member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Extensions.WebElementExtensions.SendGetCommand(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.String)
member.summary: Sends GET command directly to this instance.
member.param: Command route starting with "/" (use the complete route which comes after session id).
